column4: Hi , i bought a new laptop , ive been trying to install Ubuntu on it since the past 5 days but im not able to do so , Any help ?...Ive even burned an iso but it still wont work.
SideWinder1: ive downloaded 4 ISOs...Different architectures , its not md5
start the cd and as soon as you se the purple icons hit the "shift" key several times you get the grub press "e" and append "nomodeset" see if it works
